text: @JoeBiden Trump’s leadership in this time of extraordinary crisis: he is dong a poor job trying to quell the pandemic and rescue the economy? He has told us the coronavirus was nothing to worry about & claimed that anyone who wanted a test could get one, among many other falsehoods.
